info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:16AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...An area of heavy rain will impact portions of east central Mercer and southwestern Henry Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain over Alpha, or 12 miles southwest of Cambridge, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water and minor flooding on roadways and in low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Viola, Woodhull, Alpha, New Windsor, Bishop Hill, Ophiem, Nekoma, Ulah and Griffin. This includes Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 26 and 33. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches have fallen and an additional 0.50 to 1 inch of rain is possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
